module.name: content_blocks
module.description: The content blocks module provides the possibility to re-use content on multiple pages, wherefor the content can be managed in 1 single point, but the changes are immediately visible on all pages it occurs. Content blocks are exceptionally well-suited for recurring content like contact details or call-to-actions.

events.event: Triggered when a content block is added.
Triggered when a content block is deleted.
Triggered when a content block is edited.
